email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Soybean Meal from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for your soybean meal shipment from Santos to Shanghai. The vessel, PACIFIC TRADER, has a DWT of 65000 and an LOA of 230m. The laycan is set for October 10-15, 2023.

The initial freight quote is USD 45 per MT on CIF terms. Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybean Meal from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 42 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the loading window at Santos?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybean Meal from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 43 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 8,000 per day, and the loading window at Santos is 48 hours.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybean Meal from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 43 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybean Meal from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on October 10, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybean Meal from Santos to Shanghai - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers
